snippet: KLEIER-Jonathan. Happy 33rd Birthday Jonathan, our guardian angel. There is surely lots of champagne being opened up right now in heaven, and we can hear Jay Z and Billy Joel loud and clear, and the Palm is getting ready for your reservation. We miss and love you every second of every day, forever. You will always be the light of our lives. A huge bear hug from home. Love you, The Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: KLEIER-Jonathan. Happy 33rd Birthday Jonathan, our guardian angel. There is surely lots of champagne being opened up right now in heaven, and we can hear Jay Z and Billy Joel loud and clear, and the Palm is getting ready for your reservation. We miss and love you every second of every day, forever. You will always be the light of our lives. A huge bear hug from home. Love you, The Family 1/3
